item.title: The roadmap for Office 365 is available
item.description:
For those who are interested in knowing what’s upcoming on office 365, Microsoft recently shared publicly the roadma.

You can see what Microsoft’s teams are developing directly from this page, which will be updated on regular basisÂ https://office.microsoft.com/en-us/products/office-365-roadmap-FX104343353.aspx
